titleStmt.title: The white deuil, or The hypocrite vncased in a sermon preached at Pauls Crosse, March 7. 1612. By Thomas Adams ...
titleStmt.author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Melchisedech Bradvvood for Ralph Mab, and are to be sold in Pauls Church-yard, at the sig ne [sic] of the Angel,
